messages.message: Thank you so much for the connect!  I would love to talk about a possible position at National Sign!  I've attached a PDF of my resume, in case you are interested.  :)
I received your resume.  I assume you are looking to come back to the Columbus area.  I will share your information with our management team.
I appreciate that!  Thank you!  I bet you can come up with something really creative for me to do.
Here is an updated copy of my resume.  Jim said he was having a hard time coming up with a job description.  Not sure if this adds to the problem or not.  Is this too colorful?
